sys_hub_flow.description: Find NeedIt Tasks greater than 21 days past due using dyanmic value pulled from autoCloseOverdue property Run every Friday @ 11pm Set state to Closed Incomplete Update worknotes to show Record was closed because it was too far past the due date Write message to the log to state the NeedIt Task record was automatically closed
sys_hub_flow.name: Find and Close Long OverDue NeedIt Tasks
sys_hub_flow.sys_name: Find and Close Long OverDue NeedIt Tasks
